document.full_text: amid all the pleasantries and banalities which fill the air during a grand slam tournament, germany's much-hyped julia goerges offered a refreshing burst of realism by stating she had no chance of winning the french open.
document.title: straight-talking goerges says she has no chance
lines_and_colors: amid all the pleasantries and banalities which fill the air during a grand slam tournament, germany's much-hyped julia goerges offered a refreshing burst of realism by stating she had no chance of winning the french open.
